=== Summary ===
TBD

Ubuntu Virtual Environment (UVE) aims to provide a reliable Open Source Virtualization alternative to fill the gap for small and medium environments. Project is focused on providing the following: virtualization, cluster/ha, live migration, storage support, backup, templating.

Initial project spec is to port the <nowiki>[[http://pve.proxmox.com/|Proxmox Virtual Environment (PVE)]]</nowiki> to Ubuntu and customize it for the distro.
